LanguageData.Zhaos_CompDoor.label: Z_复合门
LanguageData.Zhaos_CompDoor.description: A door made by quantum alloy, with multithread structure it can significantly reduce damage from impact power and energy pulse.

LanguageData.Zhaos_CompDoor_Frame.label: Z_复合门 (building)
LanguageData.Zhaos_CompDoor_Frame.description: A door made by quantum alloy, with multithread structure it can significantly reduce damage from impact power and energy pulse.

LanguageData.Z_ArcLamp.label: Z_弧光灯
LanguageData.Z_ArcLamp.description: 私用版，通过特制的装置吸收周围环境的热能来发光，可以让植物生长。
